abstract: An explanation of why deals fail: It’s about timing.
snippet: An explanation of why deals fail: It’s about timing.

headline.main: Mergers in a Time of Bears
headline.print_headline: Mergers In a Time Of Bears

abstract: Yahoo plans to introduce a service called Buzz that relies on users to help it compile the most popular articles from around the Web.
snippet: Yahoo plans to introduce a service called Buzz that relies on users to help it compile the most popular articles from around the Web.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Even as it struggles to find alternatives to being acquired by Microsoft, Yahoo continues to push elements of a turnaround plan devised by Jerry Yang, the company’s co-founder and chief executive.

headline.main: Yahoo Plans to Let Users Help Mold New Feature
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Plans To Let Users Help Mold New Feature

abstract: Randy Falco, the chief executive of AOL, told a group of advertising executives that Microsoft is making a mistake in going after Yahoo. Unlike Google, which is trying to block the deal, he’s not going to get in the way.
snippet: Randy Falco, the chief executive of AOL, told a group of advertising executives that Microsoft is making a mistake in going after Yahoo. Unlike Google, which is trying to block the deal, he’s not going to get in the way.
lead_paragraph: Nobody could get off the stage at the Interactive Advertising Bureau convention here in Phoenix without being asked about the prospect of Microsoft’s acquisition of Yahoo.

headline.main: Randy Falco’s Napoleonic Strategy at AOL
